item.title: Continual lack of street sweeping, 27th February
item.description:
The lower half of Lucas Street has not been swept for at least four weeks. The street sweeper has been asked by residents on two occasions, when he has been sweeping Thornville Street, if he will be doing the lower half of Lucas Street next. On both occasions he has said yes he would, and on both occasions left without doing any work to the area whatsoever! Can someone in authority finally do something about this, please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lucas Street, New Cross, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Illegal dumping in parking space, 27th February
item.description:
Hi - I reported this incident a few days ago and have subsequently been told that the issue was resolved. Which it hasn’t been. Last night more waste was dumped in our off street parking. Please can you advise what can be done? Isthe council able to assist

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clissold Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sainsbury’s delivery trolleys, 27th February
item.description:
Sainsbury’s are still leaving their trolleys outside their store. As well as being an eyesore this is blocking wheelchair and pram access along the road and to access the ATM. Sainsbury’s used to store its trolleys in their store room but is increasingly leaving them outside all day. Please resolve.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter - outside Sainsburys, 27th February
item.description:
There is a lot of rubbish in the bushes and trees outside Sainsburys. This has been reported many times and not been cleaned. Beer cans, plastic, rubbish everywhere.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, Peckham, Greater London
